summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview focuses on the lieutenant's role and activities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein was found unresponsive. The report includes numerous attachments of prison logs and records from the relevant dates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York and found unresponsive in his cell on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: Activities Lieutenant, Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: A BOP lieutenant stationed at FCI Danbury who was interviewed by the OIG. He was the Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Senior Special Agent.

connections.description: The Senior Special Agent, along with a Special Agent, conducted a voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation.
The Special Agent participated in conducting the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant.
The lieutenant was the Activities Lieutenant at the MCC New York where Epstein was housed, responsible for oversight on August 9, 2019.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, New York.

events.title: Lieutenant's Shift Before Epstein's Death
events.description: The interviewed BOP Lieutenant served as the Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York, the day before Epstein was found dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was investigating the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Lieutenant, who was the Activities Lieutenant at MCC New York on August 9, 2019, was interviewed on July 12, 2021.
Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the MCC New York on August 10, 2019.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the report includes numerous attachments of prison logs, rosters, and count documentation from August 9-10, 2019.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum containing no recommendations or conclusions, and its distribution is restricted.
